 31 -    def __init__(self, simulation=None, trajectory=None):

 39          self._trajectory = trajectory

 75 -    def _simulationChange(self): 

 76          """ 
 77          Called when the platform is assigned a new simulation. 
 78          """ 
 79          for component in self.components: 
 80              component._simulationChange() 

 81   

 82 -    def _trajectoryChange(self): 

 83          """ 
 84          Called when the platform is assigned a new trajectory. 
 85          """ 
 86          for component in self.components: 
 87              component._trajectoryChange()
